Detailed Description

A collection of functions for interpolation and resampling of arrays.

Calculates the value of a parabola passing through three points.

Parameters
xThe x-coordinate at which to evaluate the parabola.
f_1The y-coordinate of the point with x-coordinate -1.
f0The y-coordinate of the point with x-coordinate 0.
f1The y-coordinate of the point with x-coordinate 1.
Returns
long double The value of the parabola at x.
